name: A Town Divided
description:
4 scores an’ 7 years ago, the rowdy Numbers Gang came to town and 86’ed the mayor. Several bounty hunters hoped to get their 15 minutes of fame catchin’ the lot but they all wound up drawn an’ quartered.

Word has it that the Numbers Gang are gonna come back in town. Not while I’m sherf. We got 0 tolerance for their kind here. This town ain’t big enough fer the 2 of us - there can be only 1.

A town divides against itself, hostilities multiply, and only 1 will remain.

It's a chill Wild-Western puzzle game, y'all.

Made by Sarah Asano, Stella Wang and Patrick Rall for the 2019 GMTK Game Jam.
